markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Ketephys (The Hunter)](/Deities.aspx?ID=110)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Elven Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=9)

**Edicts** Hunt and kill demons and undead, maintain the health of the forest, provide for your community

**Anathema** Take more than needed from the wilderness, hunt an animal for sport, aid Treerazer or his minions

**Area of Concern**
hunting and the moon

**Follower Alignments**
NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

**Favored Weapon** [Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)

**Domains** [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=6), [Moon](/Domains.aspx?ID=21), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=28)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Pass Without Trace](/Spells.aspx?ID=215)

- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164)

- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=12)

</column>
name: Ketephys (The Hunter)
